headline: LUMONICS PERKIN ELMER MICROARRAY ANALYSIS SYSTEM
description: The ScanArray is a wavelength scanner that supports over 50 fluorescent dyes and 2, 3 and 4 color applications including gene expression, genotyping and SNP analysis.     Product line formerly Lumonics, now owned by Perkin-Elmer  Lumonics ScanArray 5000
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Perkin Elmer
Model 5000
Description Microarray Analysis System
Accessories Autoload: Each cassette holds 20 Microarrays
QuantArray and ScanArray versions 2.0
Other Information Specifications
  • Sample size: Standard or metric slides 1" x 3"
  • Scanning field: 22mm x 73mm
  • Pixel resolution: User selectable 5, 10, 20, 30, and 50 micron
  • Excitation wavelengths: 488nm to 633nm
  • Emission wavelengths: 500nm to 700nm
  • Sensitivity: 0.1 molecule fluor/micron squared
  • Scan speed: 20 scanlines/second, full-field scan 6 minutes
  • Dynamic range: 16-bit dynamic range=5 orders of magnitude
  • Software: Ver. 2
    Part # 900-3011523000 Work station requirements:(Not included)
    Windows Pentium III 450 MHz processor; 4 GB hard drive; 128 MB RAM or better;17" or larger color monitor; CD-ROM; 1024 x 768 x 32K color or better video; 10BaseT Ethernet network interface card (NIC); Window NT Workstation 4.0, Service Pack 4 or later; Internet Explorer 5.0
Power Requirements 120/240 V 20.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Year of Manufacture 2000
Condition New-Never Used
Exterior Dimensions
Width 16.000 in (40.6 cm)
Depth 38.000 in (96.5 cm)
Height 14.000 in (35.6 cm)
Weight 108 lb (49 kg)
